info.title: Azure Video Analyzer
info.description: Azure Video Analyzer resource provider API definition.

resource.description: Resource on which the operation is performed.

displayName.description: The display name for the dimension.

toBeExportedForShoebox.description: Whether to export metric to shoebox.

values.description: The count of a number of items, usually requests.
The count of a number of items, usually requests.

enableRegionalMdmAccount.description: Indicates whether regional MDM account is enabled.

displayName.description: The diagnostic log category display name.

blobDuration.description: The time range for requests in each blob.

LogSpecification.description: A diagnostic log emitted by service.

isDataAction.description: Whether the operation applies to data-plane.

id.description: The ID of the storage account resource. Video Analyzer relies on tables, queues, and blobs. The primary storage account must be a Standard Storage account (either Microsoft.ClassicStorage or Microsoft.Storage).

identity.description: A managed identity that Video Analyzer will use to access the storage account.

status.description: The current status of the storage account mapping.

StorageAccount.description: The details about the associated storage account.

storageAccounts.description: The storage accounts for this resource.

endpoints.description: The endpoints associated with this resource.

iotHubs.description: The IoT Hubs for this resource.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Whether or not public network access is allowed for resources under the Video Analyzer account.

networkAccessControl.description: Network access control for Video Analyzer.

provisioningState.description: Provisioning state of the Video Analyzer account.

privateEndpointConnections.description: Private Endpoint Connections created under Video Analyzer account.

VideoAnalyzerProperties.description: The properties of the Video Analyzer account.

storageAccounts.description: The storage accounts for this resource.

endpoints.description: The endpoints associated with this resource.

iotHubs.description: The IoT Hubs for this resource.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Whether or not public network access is allowed for resources under the Video Analyzer account.

networkAccessControl.description: Network access control for Video Analyzer.

provisioningState.description: Provisioning state of the Video Analyzer account.

privateEndpointConnections.description: Private Endpoint Connections created under Video Analyzer account.

VideoAnalyzerPropertiesUpdate.description: The properties of the Video Analyzer account.

identity.description: The identities associated to the Video Analyzer resource.
The identities associated to the Video Analyzer resource.

VideoAnalyzerUpdate.description: The update operation for a Video Analyzer account.

UserAssignedManagedIdentity.description: The details of the user assigned managed identity used by the Video Analyzer resource.

VideoAnalyzerIdentity.description: The managed identity for the Video Analyzer resource.

userAssignedIdentity.description: The user assigned managed identity's resource identifier to use when accessing a resource.

ResourceIdentity.description: The user assigned managed identity to use when accessing a resource.

keyIdentifier.description: The URL of the Key Vault key used to encrypt the account. The key may either be versioned (for example https://vault/keys/mykey/version1) or reference a key without a version (for example https://vault/keys/mykey).

currentKeyIdentifier.description: The current key used to encrypt Video Analyzer account, including the key version.

KeyVaultProperties.description: The details for accessing the encryption keys in Key Vault.

values.description: The Account Key is encrypted with a System Key.
The Account Key is encrypted with a Customer Key.

type.description: The type of key used to encrypt the Account Key.

keyVaultProperties.description: The properties of the key used to encrypt the account.

status.description: The current status of the Key Vault mapping.

AccountEncryption.description: Defines how the Video Analyzer account is (optionally) encrypted.

status.description: The current status of the Iot Hub mapping.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Whether or not public network access is allowed for specified resources under the Video Analyzer account.

integration.description: Public network access for integration group.

ingestion.description: Public network access for ingestion group.

consumption.description: Public network access for consumption group.

NetworkAccessControl.description: Network access control for video analyzer account.

VideoAnalyzerPrivateEndpointConnectionOp.description: Status of private endpoint connection operation.

get.description: Lists the Video Analyzer accounts in the specified resource group.
Get the details of the specified Video Analyzer account

put.summary: Create or update a Video Analyzer account
put.description: Create or update an instance of a Video Analyzer account

Retry-After.description: The recommended number of seconds to wait before calling the URI specified in Azure-AsyncOperation.

Location.description: The URI to poll for completion status.

Azure-AsyncOperation.description: The URI to poll for completion status.

delete.description: Delete the specified Video Analyzer account

patch.description: Updates an existing instance of Video Analyzer account

Get group ID for video analyzer account.

parameters.description: Name of the private link resource (Group ID).

Get private endpoint connection under video analyzer account.
